short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks the weather at your current location and recommends what to wear based on the conditions outside.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever have trouble dressing for the weather? Sweater Weather is a popup that displays the weather conditions at your current location and makes clothing recommendations. It's convenient: anytime you want to see how the weather is outside, click on the Sweater Weather icon and weather information, along with what you should wear, will appear in a non-disruptive popup.
